articles.title: Warner to retire from Test cricket
articles.description: David Warner has revealed he plans to step away from Test cricket at the end of the next home summer, explaining his desire to have a farewell tour concluding at his beloved Sydney Cricket Ground.
articles.content:
David Warner has revealed he plans to step away from Test cricket at the end of the next home summer, explaining his desire to have a farewell tour concluding at his beloved Sydney Cricket Ground.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
